question: 55 y/o w/m asymptomatic. No hist HBP, Diabetes,Hypercholesterolemia. F/H HD,arrested Lupus 25 years,post intensive Steroid therapy 25 years. Normal ECG, Normal treadmill stress test. Calcium score 145.Is there any indication for further w/u, i.e. Nuclear Stress testing
title: Indications for further w/u of Calcium score 160
